scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
scripts.usemin: usemin contact.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/contact.html && usemin about.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/about.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin gallery.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/gallery.html && usemin home.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/home.html && usemin korea.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/korea.html && usemin shanghai.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/shanghai.html && usemin sydney.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/sydney.html && usemin tokyo.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/tokyo.html && usemin washington.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/washington.html && usemin berlin.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/berlin.hmtl
